It's all here:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.0+and+3.1+User+Guide

...but I just noticed last week that something at the wiki host seems to 
have jumbled the original logical ordering/grouping of all those child 
pages.

In particular, I believe the progression around that topic should be 
roughly:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+Installation

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+Configuration

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Running+Heritrix+3.0+and+3.1

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Web-based+User+Interface

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Security+Considerations

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/A+Quick+Guide+to+Running+Your+First+Crawl+Job

(I've just reordered those to be near the top of the User-Guide tree 
view, but the rest of the pages there are still jumbled.)

None of these steps have changed since 2011, so these are the current docs.

- Gordon

On 9/19/12 3:21 AM, martinhuwa2012 wrote:
> the current wiki and documentation seem to be unfinished
> i miss the installation and usage instructions
>
> https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+Installation
>
> and then?
>
> last edits were 2011
> so no current documentation?
